title: The end of the First World War and the Duke of Wellington
itunes:title: The end of the First World War and the Duke of Wellington
itunes:subtitle: Professor Robert Gerwarth discusses his new book The Vanquished, which shows how Europe continued to be beset by violence long after 1918. Meanwhile, Dr Huw Davies pays a visit to Apsley House, the magnificent London residence of the hero of Waterloo ...
description:
Professor Robert Gerwarth discusses his new book The Vanquished, which shows how Europe continued to be beset by violence long after 1918. Meanwhile, Dr Huw Davies pays a visit to Apsley House, the magnificent London residence of the hero of Waterloo

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
